description: Main entry point of a Flutter mobile application for a Recipe Explorer app. Sets up providers, routing, and the primary scaffold with bottom navigation, including Home and Search screens.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that initializes themes, routing, and providers.

classes.name: RootScaffold
classes.description: Main Scaffold with bottom navigation for navigating between core sections.

classes.name: _RootScaffoldState
classes.description: State class managing the bottom navigation's current index and displayed pages.

classes.name: _FavoritesTabWrapper
classes.description: Placeholder widget for the Favorites tab.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and RootScaffold, setting up providers, theme, routes, and UI layout.
